title: Understanding Cancer Pt.2
brief_description: This program is the second part of a three part documentary that looks at cancer. Presented by Professor Richard Fox of the Ludwig Institute of Cancer Research, this program focuses on the disease from the patient’s point of view. The patients who appear in this documentary discuss their experiences with treatment and talk about their physical and emotional reactions.
